snippet: The oft-injured midfielder Stuart Holden will miss six to nine months after his latest knee operation, but his news this week wasn’t all bad.
lead_paragraph: The oft-injured midfielder Stuart Holden will miss six to nine months after his latest knee operation, but his news this week wasn’t all bad.
